channel.title: Phenology on Sebastián Ayala Ruano
channel.description: Recent content in Phenology on Sebastián Ayala Ruano

item.title: Prediction of the phenological stages of tropical forest species using herbarium records
item.description: I contributed to this project as part of my work as data scientist consultant at Universidad de las Américas, in Ecuador. Summary The initial species list comprised 636 unique names, which were filtered to delete duplicates and records identified at a genus level. The final list comprised 438 accepted names verified based on the Checklist of the Vascular Plants of the Americas (CVPA), publicly available on a website on the Missouri Botanical Garden database Tropicos.
